name: CarouselView
info: A carousel component that conforms to Material Design specifications. Displays a scrollable list of items, each of which can dynamically resize based on the selected layout.

nodes.name: CarouselView Basic Usage
desc: 【itemExtent】 : Forced size in the main axis direction 【double】
【shrinkExtent】: Minimum size of the item in the main axis direction during scrolling 【double】
